feed.title: TubeSync Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for TubeSync: v0.13.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update other-database-backends.md by @klinker41 in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/435
  • Add support for regex video title filtering by @locke4 in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/425
  • Fix signals.py mistake by @locke4 in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/438

New Contributors

  • @klinker41 made their first contribution in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/435
  • @locke4 made their first contribution in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/425

Full Changelog: https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/compare/v0.13.2...v0.13.3

entry.title: New release for TubeSync: v0.13.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • compress sync_media table for mariadb by @depuhitv in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/443
  • Added season and episode tags in NFO to get Jellyfin displaying correctly by @InterN0te in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/448
  • Update other-database-backends.md by @ShaneBridges1234 in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/452
  • Optimized source page and dashboard loading by @skayred in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/460
  • Following Delete files on disk #426 by @InterN0te in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/450
  • Delete files on disk by @sparklesmcfadden in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/426
  • Skip metadata and thumbnails if they are past the cutoff date by @geoah in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/293
  • Added an option to export channels thumbnails for Jellyfin by @InterN0te in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/449

New Contributors

  • @depuhitv made their first contribution in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/443
  • @InterN0te made their first contribution in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/448
  • @ShaneBridges1234 made their first contribution in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/452
  • @skayred made their first contribution in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/460
  • @geoah made their first contribution in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/293

Full Changelog: https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/compare/v0.13.3...v0.13.4

entry.title: New release for TubeSync: v0.13.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Use assertEqual as pluralized doesn't exist by @joestump in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/513
  • Improve skip filtering with regex invert and duration limits by @timwhite in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/515
  • Allow semi easy addition to filtering logic by @timwhite in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/516
  • Docker build caching by @timwhite in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/517
  • Add support for indexing Streams by @FaySmash in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/523

New Contributors

  • @joestump made their first contribution in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/513
  • @timwhite made their first contribution in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/515
  • @FaySmash made their first contribution in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/523

Full Changelog: https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/compare/v0.13.6...v0.13.7
